SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , RNUM , ID , BSMNO , REVIEW , MREVIEW , SAL , SPOT , B_CNT , REG_DATE , UP_DATE , DEL_DATE , DEL_YN , M_STATUS , M_DIFFICULTLY , M_DATE , COMPANY , FIELD FROM ( SELECT A.RNUM , A.ID , A.BSMNO , A.REVIEW , A.MREVIEW , A.SAL , A.SPOT , A.B_CNT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.UP_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS UP_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.DEL_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS DEL_DATE , A.DEL_YN , A.M_STATUS , A.M_DIFFICULTLY , TO_CHAR(A.M_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS M_DATE , B.COMPANY , B.FIELD FROM REVIEW A, BIZ B WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN='N' AND A.REVIEW IS NOT NULL AND A.BSMNO=B.BSMNO ORDER BY A.RNUM ) A ) A WHERE 1=1 AND RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ID , BSMNO , AVG_SAL , SPOT , MAX_SAL , MIN_SAL , PER_SAL FROM ( SELECT MAX(ID) AS ID , BSMNO , AVG(SAL) AS AVG_SAL , MAX(SPOT) AS SPOT , MAX(SAL) AS MAX_SAL , MIN(SAL) AS MIN_SAL , ROUND((AVG(SAL)/MAX(SAL))*100,2)||'%' AS PER_SAL FROM REVIEW WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN='N' AND SAL IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SPOT, BSMNO ) A ) A, BIZ B WHERE 1=1 AND A.BSMNO=B.BSMNO
